oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Shoppers & visitors map of downtown friendly Nashville, 1956
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A 1956 shopping and visitors map of downtown Nashville, Tennessee. The streets are labeled with address numbers and building names. A straight listing of prominent buildings and stores by category is also included on the lower portion of the map. Downtown was once Nashville's most dominant shopping district. Notable buildings on this map include popular churches, banks, hotels, restaurants and retail stores. Forms part of the Nashville Room Map Collection. 1 map : col. ; 17.75 x 19.75 in.
